name: Sir Stackems
description:
Fight the sandwiches to get stacked with more toppings, but watch out! If you run out of toppings you die!

Created in a week by Alexa, Audrey, Collin, Johnathan, and Rosko for the Houdini Game Jam 2021

Controls:

Move with WASD or Left Joystick.
Attack with Left Click, E, or X (controller)
Jump with Space or A (controller) (try mashing jump for some extra airtime!)
Dodge with Right Click, Left Shift, or B (controller)

Known Bugs:

Sometimes you do not respawn after dying.
